nodes.text: Andy Diggle is a British comic book writer, who wrote the comic Payback. A former editor of 2000 AD, he is best known for his work on The Losers, Swamp Thing, Adam Strange and Silent Dragon.

He is currently working on Batman Confidential, Green Arrow: Year One as well as unnamed projects including a comic mini-series and a computer game with a Japanese firm. He will also start writing Hellblazer as of issue #230. He will also be writing Guy Ritchie's Gamekeeper with Guy Ritchie - part of Virgin Comics' "Director's cut" line. Diggle is also writing the webcomic adaptation of the Bionic Commando game.
